tha-ap425:8.1: Na me deyyadhammo atthi → na me deyyaṁ tava atthi (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed); na me deyyaṁ tavam atthi (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap425:10.1: Vissattho → vissaṭṭho (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1, mr); visaṭṭho (csp1ed)
tha-ap425:10.4: paripūrissatināgate → paripūrissatanāgate (bj); paripūressatāsanaṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed); paripūressati'nāgate (pts-vp-pli1); paripūrissatāsanaṁ (mr)
